attributes.action: To fund sign language courses for parents with deaf children .
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to help support parents and carers to have sign lanaguage lesson with there chrildren to be able to communicate with them and support them .
attributes.background: To fund sign language classes for parent and cares with sign lanaguage courses to be able to help communicate with there deaf children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623900
